name: DH New Mark
author: DREAMHIVE / mkoba

sections.description:
The New mark is displayed in a new Posts.
The display of the New mark can adjust the number and the period.
The New mark can be selected from among some colors.
An original New mark can be used.

New Mark Icons

sozai.7gates.net to provide.

Localization

Japanese language file has been used only a description.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire dh-new-mark folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where is the setting changed?

“DH New Mark settings” is added to the “Settings” menu.

short_description: The DH New Mark, New posts in the loop to display the mark.
